title: India bids to attract over $200B in AI infrastructure investment by 2028
description: India is ramping up shared AI compute, adding 20,000 GPUs as part of a broader push to attract global AI investment.
content: India is ramping up shared AI compute, adding 20,000 GPUs as part of a broader push to attract global AI investment.
